      public static DataStore getConfig()
      Gets a global data store that is tied to this server's config file.
      Returns:
      the server's config file

    • getDataStore

      public static DataStore getDataStore()
      Gets a global data store that will be shared across any servers running on the same database. This store should be used to store persistent data, unrelated to config. Data should not be specific to any particular player - use WaterCoreUser.getDataStore() for this purpose.
      Returns:
      a global data store
